title: Snatch the M3 MacBook Air for the craziest bargain we’ve ever seen
content:
Macworld

The best laptop we’ve tested in a while, the M3 MacBook Air, is now on sale over at Amazon for an amazing $1,050, down from its usual MSRP of $1,299. This is the best price we’ve seen for this model yet, making it the perfect time to add it to your cart.

The new MacBook Air is one we loved dearly, giving it a 4.5/5 star rating in our review and even our Editors’ Choice award. Our expert noted the laptop is a great combination of price, features, and performance. “The MacBook Air is a great laptop, especially for users who prioritize mobility. Thanks to Apple silicon, it can handle whatever task you need to do, whether it’s as simple as using a word processor while being online with a gazillion Safari tabs open, or a bit more complex with iMovie and GarageBand, or pro-level work with a video production tool or software development,” we wrote.

This laptop features a powerful M3 chip that ensures you’ll get a smooth experience no matter if you’re playing, working, or endlessly scrolling through social media. It’s also as light as it can possibly be, making it perfect to carry with you anywhere you go. Even better, it’s under half an inch thin, so you can slip it inside your bag and throw in an extra portable screen in there if you want.

Plus, with up to 18 hours of battery life, you can leave the charger at home and focus on productivity throughout the day.

Don’t miss out on this unbeatable offer for the 2024 Apple MacBook Air that’s down to $1049.98 at Amazon and grab one of the best laptops on the market that’s also not-so-secretly one of our favorites.
